trans-unit.source: Your online store needs to have a proper carrier registered in PrestaShop as soon as you start shipping your products. This means sending yours parcels using your local postal service, or having a contract with a private carrier which in turn will ship your parcels to your customers. In order to have PrestaShop suggest the most adequate carrier to your customers during their order checkout process, you need to register all the carriers with which you have chosen to work.
trans-unit.target: Your online store needs to have a proper carrier registered in PrestaShop as soon as you start shipping your products. This means sending yours parcels using your local postal service, or having a contract with a private carrier which in turn will ship your parcels to your customers. In order to have PrestaShop suggest the most adequate carrier to your customers during their order checkout process, you need to register all the carriers with which you have chosen to work.

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop comes with a number of carrier modules that you can activate. You can also buy carrier modules on the PrestaShop Addons marketplace. Recommended modules are listed below: install the module that matches your carrier, and configure it!
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop comes with a number of carrier modules that you can activate. You can also buy carrier modules on the PrestaShop Addons marketplace. Recommended modules are listed below: install the module that matches your carrier, and configure it!

trans-unit.source: If there is no existing module for your carrier, then you can register that carrier by hand using the information that it can provide you: shipping rates, regional zones, size and weight limits, etc. Click on the "Add new carrier" button below to open the Carrier Wizard, which will help you register a new carrier in a few steps.
trans-unit.target: If there is no existing module for your carrier, then you can register that carrier by hand using the information that it can provide you: shipping rates, regional zones, size and weight limits, etc. Click on the "Add new carrier" button below to open the Carrier Wizard, which will help you register a new carrier in a few steps.

trans-unit.source: Note: DO NOT register a new carrier if there already exists a module for it! Using a module will be much faster and more accurate!
trans-unit.target: Note: DO NOT register a new carrier if there already exists a module for it! Using a module will be much faster and more accurate!

trans-unit.source: The carrier's name will be displayed during checkout.
trans-unit.target: The carrier's name will be displayed during checkout.

trans-unit.source: The delivery time will be displayed during checkout.
trans-unit.target: The delivery time will be displayed during checkout.

trans-unit.source: Delivery tracking URL: Type '@' where the tracking number should appear. It will be automatically replaced by the tracking number.
trans-unit.target: Delivery tracking URL: Type '@' where the tracking number should appear. It will be automatically replaced by the tracking number.

trans-unit.source: For example: 'http://example.com/track.php?num=@' with '@' where the tracking number should appear.
trans-unit.target: For example: 'http://example.com/track.php?num=@' with '@' where the tracking number should appear.

trans-unit.source: Include the handling costs (as set in Shipping > Preferences) in the final carrier price.
trans-unit.target: Include the handling costs (as set in Shipping > Preferences) in the final carrier price.

trans-unit.source: Out-of-range behavior occurs when no defined range matches the customer's cart (e.g. when the weight of the cart is greater than the highest weight limit defined by the weight ranges).
trans-unit.target: Out-of-range behavior occurs when no defined range matches the customer's cart (e.g. when the weight of the cart is greater than the highest weight limit defined by the weight ranges).

trans-unit.source: Maximum width managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Maximum width managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.

trans-unit.source: The value must be an integer.
trans-unit.target: The value must be an integer.

trans-unit.source: Maximum height managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Maximum height managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.

trans-unit.source: Maximum depth managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Maximum depth managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.

trans-unit.source: Maximum weight managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Maximum weight managed by this carrier. Set the value to "0", or leave this field blank to ignore.

trans-unit.source: Allowed characters: letters, spaces and "%special_chars%".
trans-unit.target: Allowed characters: letters, spaces and "%special_chars%".

trans-unit.source: For in-store pickup, enter 0 to replace the carrier name with your shop name.
trans-unit.target: For in-store pickup, enter 0 to replace the carrier name with your shop name.

trans-unit.source: Enter "0" for a longest shipping delay, or "9" for the shortest shipping delay.
trans-unit.target: Enter "0" for a longest shipping delay, or "9" for the shortest shipping delay.

trans-unit.source: Mark the groups that are allowed access to this carrier.
trans-unit.target: Mark the groups that are allowed access to this carrier.

trans-unit.source: Enable the carrier in the front office.
trans-unit.target: Enable the carrier in the front office.

trans-unit.source: Carrier name displayed during checkout
trans-unit.target: Carrier name displayed during checkout

trans-unit.source: Upload a logo from your computer.
trans-unit.target: Upload a logo from your computer.

trans-unit.target: or

trans-unit.source: Apply both regular shipping cost and product-specific shipping costs.

trans-unit.source: You need to register all the carriers with which you have chosen to work. PrestaShop comes with a selection of carrier modules you can install right below the page or buy on [1]Addons marketplace[/1].
trans-unit.target: You need to register all the carriers with which you have chosen to work. PrestaShop comes with a selection of carrier modules you can install right below the page or buy on [1]Addons marketplace[/1].

trans-unit.source: If there is no existing module for your carrier, you can register it manually by clicking on "[1]" but before, please make sure you did not register a new carrier if a module already exists for it!
trans-unit.target: If there is no existing module for your carrier, you can register it manually by clicking on "[1]" but before, please make sure you did not register a new carrier if a module already exists for it.
